The seven people who are worthy of offer: A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and has realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and their defilements and their life come to an end at exactly the same time
A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished between one life and the next
A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished upon landing
A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished without extra effort
A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and with the ending of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished with extra effort
A person who meditates observing impermanence in all conditions and with the ending of the five lower fetters they head upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.
